Articles.Content:
Not sure how to put this with 10 mins to type

but here's a link to the page

It's available on steam,

but news is here:

Star Trek Online News
Also, the new expansion is coming out on (big star trek reference here) Tuesday.

"Get me the new Update!"

"Sir,the update was't going to be installed until--"

"Let me guess... Tuesday."

Tuesday never came for the Enterprise-B, but it is NOW season 9.5!

Released!!!

Tuesday never came for the Enterprise-B, but it is NOW season 9.5!

Released!!!

Incorrect.

Delta Rising is a full expansion with new episode mission, queues and content, released on 14 October 2014.

Season 9.5 was a partial update to the crafting system, released on 17 July 2014.
Decent game, but the stupid ground combat and horror imitation missions ruin the experience.

I bought the game immediately after release and i also got the lifetime abo from that time. If i would had known that they make some F2P title out of it i never would have done that.

I got really disapointed of how they messed the game up, if you wanna fly nice looking ship's you will have to pay for them. Also for pretty much other stuff that could make your life easier in the game like a big inventory and such. Also this tempting lockboxes having nothing then a bunch of crap in it for exorbitant prices !!!

This game is scam, i am embarrassed how they misuse the good name of Star Trek for their greediness.

no star citizen threads?

Feel free to start one, but this isn't it.

So what Star Trek universe is STO based on?

The original one?

Or the new one (where Vulcan is destroyed)?
